description: Google has confirmed plans to implement Web Monetization in Chrome, allowing website owners to receive micro-payments as tips or rewards for their content as an additional way to generate revenue. [...]
title: Google Chrome will let you send money to your favourite website

description: A global stop-payment mechanism created by INTERPOL successfully recovered over $40 million stolen in a BEC attack on a company in Singapore. [...]
title: INTERPOL recovers over $40 million stolen in a BEC attack

description: Samsung has launched a new bug bounty program for its mobile devices with rewards of up to $1,000,000 for reports demonstrating critical attack scenarios. [...]
title: Samsung to pay $1,000,000 for RCEs on Galaxy’s secure vault

description: The Grand Palais Réunion des musées nationaux (Rmn) in France is warning that it suffered a cyberattack on Saturday night, August 3, 2024. [...]
title: France's Grand Palais discloses cyberattack during Olympic games

description: A hacker has breached Mobile Guardian, a digital classroom management platform used worldwide, and remotely wiped data from at least 13,000 student's iPads and Chromebooks. [...]
title: Hacker wipes 13,000 devices after breaching classroom management platform

description: Stolen credentials are a big problem, commonly used to breach networks in attacks. Learn more from Specops Software about checking the password hygiene of your Active Directory. [...]
title: Point of entry: Why hackers target stolen credentials for initial access

description: Proton VPN has announced a series of updates to its Windows and Android apps to help users combat censorship, circumvent blocks, and protect themselves from authoritarian governments due to using forbidden tools. [...]
title: Proton VPN adds ‘Discreet Icons’ to hide app on Android devices
